Fault.name: Mediators/StringDecorator.mplan
Fault.msg: Assigning property/constant "xp20:lower-case($in.parameters/tns:prettifyString/arg0)" to element "$out.parameters/tns:prettifyStringResponse/return". Please make sure target is single leaf node, otherwise non-leaf node will contain only string value which may generate non-valid xml as per the xsd.
